welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Bedwas! Known for its rich history and breathtaking landscapes, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cardiff Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Cardiff Airport is used for overflow flights during peak travel times.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bristol Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
